general.couldNotUploadAttachments: Couldn't upload all attachments. Please try again.
general.loginFirst: Please login to JIRA in settings menu first!
general.couldNotDetectEmail: Couldn't determine the current email. Please switch the focus to another email and try again
general.couldNotRenderMarkup: Could not render the selected text as JIRA markup. Please switch to plain text or contact us to get this fixed!
general.restartNecessary: JIRA for Outlook made some changes to your Outlook. Please restart Outlook once again to use all new functions.
general.couldNotReachJira: Couldn't connect to JIRA. Either the system does not exist anymore or is currently not reachable. (e.g. Proxy or VPN is missing)
general.applicationLinkUnknown: The application link is unknown. Please make sure you have an application link in JIRA called: yasoonjira
general.timestampRefused: JIRA refused the request because of time differences. Either your local time is not set correctly or the JIRA server has a wrong time (Different timezones are ok).
general.certificateInvalid: The certificate you are using in the application link is invalid. Please make sure you have setup JIRA correctly. Afterwards visit the settings and click on "Reload System Information"
general.unexpectedJiraError: This did not work due to an unexpected JIRA error.

dialog.connectionError: Connection Error. Loading Values from Jira not possible.
dialog.errorSelectIssue: Please select the issue you want to comment!
dialog.errorNoData: Please add either an comment or select an attachment
dialog.errorSubmitComment: Connection Error! Commenting did not work: {{error}}
dialog.errorAttachment: Connection Error: Uploading the attachments failed: {{error}}
dialog.errorSubmitIssue:
Sorry, that did not work. Check your input and try again.  
 {{error}}
dialog.errorCreateAttachment: Issue {{key}} created, but uploading the attachments did not work. {{error}}
dialog.errorMarkupRenderer: Could not render the selected text as JIRA markup. Please switch to plain text or contact us to get this fixed!
dialog.SDExplanation: Service Desk assignments make the issue visible for the reporter in the Service Desk as "Own Request"
dialog.titleToggleJiraMarkup: Toggle between Jira Markup or plaintext
dialog.titleReplaceWith: If you like to add the whole mail as .msg attachment, use the "add attachment" link below

logWork.title: Log Work
logWork.timeSpentDescription: An estimate of how much time you have spent working

settings.headingLogin: Bitte wählen Sie Ihr JIRA System aus und melden sich an.
settings.headingChooseSettings: Sie können Ihre Einstellungen jetzt anpassen. Bitte melden Sie sich nur ab, wenn Sie das JIRA System wechseln möchten.
settings.selectSystem: Bitte wählen Sie Ihr System aus
settings.systemMissing: Ihr JIRA System ist nicht dabei?
settings.addAttachmentsOnNewAddIssue: E-Mail Anhänge in Dialogen automatisch hinzufügen
settings.addEmailOnNewAddIssue: E-Mail als Datei (.msg) in Dialogen automatisch hinzufügen
settings.addMailHeaderAutomatically: E-Mail Kopfzeilen automatisch zur Vorgang-Beschreibung hinzufügen
settings.syncComment: Ich auf den Vorgang kommentiert habe
settings.showFeedIf: Zeige Einträge im Feed für Vorgänge, wenn:
